annotation.spannedText: You should consider immunisation against hepatitis A before you travel to certain countries, such as the Indian subcontinent

classMention.mentionClass: You should consider immunisation against hepatitis A before you travel to certain countries, such as the Indian subcontinent

annotation.spannedText: Travellers to countries outside Western Europe, North America and Australasia should consider being immunised

classMention.mentionClass: Travellers to countries outside Western Europe, North America and Australasia should consider being immunised

annotation.spannedText: The most important measure for anybody with hepatitis A is good personal hygiene

classMention.mentionClass: The most important measure for anybody with hepatitis A is good personal hygiene

annotation.spannedText: if you have been infected with hepatitis A in the past, you should be immune to further infection and therefore not need immunisation

classMention.mentionClass: if you have been infected with hepatitis A in the past, you should be immune to further infection and therefore not need immunisation

annotation.spannedText: These antibodies protect you from illness should you become infected with this virus

classMention.mentionClass: These antibodies protect you from illness should you become infected with this virus

annotation.spannedText: you should have an injection at least two weeks before travel to allow immunity to develop

classMention.mentionClass: you should have an injection at least two weeks before travel to allow immunity to develop

annotation.spannedText: If you are late with this second dose, you should have it as soon as possible but you don't need to start with the first dose again

classMention.mentionClass: If you are late with this second dose, you should have it as soon as possible but you don't need to start with the first dose again

annotation.spannedText: In this situation, it is best to postpone immunisation until after you have fully recovered from the illness

classMention.mentionClass: In this situation, it is best to postpone immunisation until after you have fully recovered from the illness

annotation.spannedText: One type of vaccine (Epaxal®) should not be given to anyone who is known to be allergic to eggs

classMention.mentionClass: One type of vaccine (Epaxal®) should not be given to anyone who is known to be allergic to eggs

annotation.spannedText: when travelling to at-risk areas, you should have very good personal hygiene and also be careful about what you eat and drink

classMention.mentionClass: when travelling to at-risk areas, you should have very good personal hygiene and also be careful about what you eat and drink

annotation.spannedText: You should avoid eating and drinking the following when travelling to areas where the risk of hepatitis A is higher

classMention.mentionClass: You should avoid eating and drinking the following when travelling to areas where the risk of hepatitis A is higher

annotation.spannedText: be careful when buying food from street traders

classMention.mentionClass: be careful when buying food from street traders

annotation.spannedText: Make sure that food has been recently prepared and that it is served hot and on clean serving plates

classMention.mentionClass: Make sure that food has been recently prepared and that it is served hot and on clean serving plates
